SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, B.*, WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME WHR_REALNAME, WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME, to_char(B.SQKSSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') SQKSRQ, to_char(B.SQJSSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') SQJSRQ, ( CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '无效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END ) ZT_NAME, '供应商编号:'||B.GYSBM || ' ' || ( CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END ) REC_HD, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END ) DATA_VERSION
FROM D_015_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.CJRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from D_015_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj ) WHERE 2 >=RNO
